name: Chocolate Chip Treasure Cookies
author: Mary Ann Lumsden

ingredients.name: pkg. (12 oz.) semi-sweet chocolate chips (2 cups)

instructions: Heat oven to 375Â°. In small bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, flour and baking powder. In large bowl, beat sweetened condensed milk and margarine until smooth. Add graham crumb mixture. Mix well, Add coconut, chocolate chips and nuts. Drop by rounded table- spoons onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake 9 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Store loosely covered at room temperature.
